channel.title: Any Coder can do this -> Need help in Making Dialogue With Object (667/7**)
channel.description:
How to make a Dialogue with Object (Completionist Cape Stand)? i wanted when someone click on Completionist Cape Stand got a dialogue if he wana but Trimmed or Normal How i can make this? ----------------------------------------- Like This:.... Step.1: [center]Object: Wana Buy Completionist Cape? Yes, please No, thanks[/center] Step.2: After Player answer Yes.... [center]Choose one of these 2 Cape's Trimmed Normal[/center] then player choose and buy cape he chooses
Skype: Evil.Wrecked (Or leave your Skype name in Replie) ---------------------- Thank you.... Taylor.

item.title: Any Coder can do this -> Need help in Making Dialogue With Object (667/7**)
item.dc:creator: @torvakillers torvakillers
item.description:
@torvakillers wrote:

How to make a Dialogue with Object (Completionist Cape Stand)?
i wanted when someone click on Completionist Cape Stand got a dialogue if he wana but Trimmed or Normal
How i can make this?

Like This:…
Step.1:
[center]Object:
Wana Buy Completionist Cape?
Yes, please
No, thanks[/center]
Step.2: After Player answer Yes…
[center]Choose one of these 2 Cape’s
Trimmed
Normal[/center]
then player choose and buy cape he chooses

Skype: Evil.Wrecked (Or leave your Skype name in Replie)

Thank you…
Taylor.

Read full topic
